title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be retained in the list box after modifying the default value. Additionally, after step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings. 
2. Set the default value to 'aaa' in the list box. 
3. Modify the default value. 
4. Check if the default value is retained in the list box. 
5. Check if the OK button is grayed out after modifying the default value.
